     <div id="breadcrumbsl">
      <span id="bc_library_home">

      <span id="bc_libguides_home">

        Subject Guides

      <span id="bc_guide_name">
       Communication and Public Relations

    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Communication and Public Relations &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/commpr
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">
      <span class="iprint">
       <a href="/print_content.php?pid=564300&amp;sid=4651733&amp;mode=g" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>
     <span class="rssupdatelink" style="padding:0px 10px; border-left:dotted thin #666666;">

       <a href="#" onclick="return showDlg('RSS Updates','/process_content.php?m=rssupdates&amp;iid=3322&amp;pid=564300&amp;sid=4651733&amp;gid=0&amp;uid=63913',0)" title="Subscribe to Updates via RSS">
        RSS Updates
       </a>

    <div class="stitle" id="guide_tab_title_bar">

       <td align="left" width="65%" height="23" nowrap="nowrap">
        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_name">
         Home
        </span>
        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_print" class="font11">
         <span class="iprint">
          <a href="/print_content.php?pid=564300&amp;sid=4651733" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
           Print Page
          </a>
         </span>
        </span>
       </td>
       <td align="right" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        <span class="lgsearch">
        </span>
        <form method="post" name="homesearch" style="display:inline;">
         <!--labels to help with accessibility -->
         <label for="searchs" style="display:none;">
          Search Text
         </label>
         <label for="what" style="display:none;">
          Search Type
         </label>
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
          <tr>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">
             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_dropdown" class="lgsearch_item">
             <select id="what" name="what" class="dropdownform" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;">

              </option>

              </option>
             </select>
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">

              Search
             </button>
            </div>
           </td>

    <div id="commentslistp4651733" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17115127">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17115127">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17115127">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding News Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17115127">
          <p>
           For national news...
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including media and communication. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           For local news...
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://www.mondotimes.com/1/world/us/38">
             Mondo Times, Worldwide News Media Guide: Pennsylvania
            </a>
            <br />
            Links to local media in the United States and worldwide, including newspaper, TV stations, news radio stations, and online news sources.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/morningcall/ip?accountid=40980">
             Morning Call
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of articles from the Allentown-based Morning Call newspaper. Coverage from 1984 to 1 day ago. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17115127" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17115128">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17115128">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17115128">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Company / Organization Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17115128">
          <p>
           For non-profits...
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://www.guidestar.org/">
             Guidestar
            </a>
            <br />
            Offers basic directory information plus financial statements, mission and programs, goals and results, and leaders.&nbsp; Password access only; consult your instructor.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://nccs.urban.org/">
             National Center for Charitable Statistics
            </a>
            <br />
            "National repository of data on the nonprofit sector in the United States."
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           For for-profits...
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bsh">
             Business Source Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            A database with lots of journal and trade magazine articles. Also provides company information. Use the Company Profiles link in the blue navigation bar at the top of the screen.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of lots of popular newspaper and magazine articles.&nbsp; Also provides company information.&nbsp; Use the Get Company Info box on the homepage search screen.&nbsp;
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17115128" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17115129">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17115129">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17115129">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Local Community Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17115129">
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/">
             American Factfinder
             <br />
            </a>
            A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://lehighvalleyresearch.org/">
             Lehigh Valley Research Consortium
             <br />
            </a>
            Collects quantitative and qualitative data on the Lehigh Valley on: demographics, public opinion , economic indicators, non-profit sector, governmental sector, and more.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.portal.state.pa.us/portal/server.pt/community/data_and_statistics/7202">
             Pennsylvania Department of Education
             <br />
            </a>
            "Information about schools, student progress, graduation rates, school districts," and more.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://pasdc.hbg.psu.edu/">
             Pennsylvania State Data Center
             <br />
            </a>
            Official source of demographic and economic data for Pennsylvania.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.bls.gov/">
             U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
             <br />
            </a>
            "Principal fact-finding agency for the Federal Government in the broad field of labor economics and statistics." Find statistics and data on inflation, spending, employment, wages, productivity, and more.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17115129" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20540963">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20540963">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20540963">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20540963">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.&nbsp;
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             APA, Chicago, and MLA Styles
            </strong>
            , see:
            <ul>
             <li>
              <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
               Citation Styles
              </a>
              (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/section/2/">
               Citation Resources
              </a>
              (Purdue University Online Writing Lab)
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://writing.wisc.edu/Handbook/Documentation.html">
               Documentation Resources
              </a>
              (University of Wisconsin Writer's Handbook)
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt20540963" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4651733" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>

       <div id="wrapbox18457370">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18457370">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18457370">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117745" class="boxatt">
